thread.section_title: Golden Tulip Hotel Washington Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasant stay
thread.title_full: Pleasant stay - Review of Golden Tulip Hotel Washington Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Zahra R
title: Pleasant stay
text:
Me and my husband stayed here for two nights we had a pleasant stay the hotel location is very great five minutes walk to louvre museum and bus stop and metro station, it's very close to lots of cafe and restaurants. The hotel itself is not fancy but it's really cozy, clean and comfortable. And it has all the necessary utilities the staff are very friendly and helpful.
We used the water bottle from the fridge and the tax was the same amount of the water price! There is supermarket is just at the other side of the street. Breakfast is not fancy but it's ok but I recommend using cafes and explore the french cafes and they exceptional food and pastry and drinks
